data.event: Initially established to serve the nearby Alunite, a source of potash, mine at nearby Lake Campion, land was set aside in 1942 for a townsite.
Lots were surveyed soon afterward and the town was gazetted in 1943.

event.title: was erected in the town reserve in 1943

data.event: A potash works was erected in the town reserve in 1943.
Production ceased in 1952; the entire town was sold off in 1953.
Production ceased in 1952; the entire town was sold off in 1953.
